3. Since the coach for Miami, Randy Shannon, has only spent 4 years at the school (as indicated in the "years at school" column), it is reasonable to assume that most, if not all, of his record at Miami would have been accumulated during his time in the ACC conference.
4. Find the column that contains the ACC record for each team - "acc record". This column will help us determine Miami's record in the ACC conference.
5. Examine the row corresponding to Miami in the "acc record" column, which is 13 (the value in the "acc record" cell of the 8th row).
6. Compare the value obtained in step 5 with the claim - "miami have a 11 - 13 ACC conference record".
7. Since the actual ACC record for Miami is 13, which matches the number of losses claimed in the statement (13), we can conclude that the claim is TRUE.

Final answer:

}
